img_text: usten You've been laid your hand out, no tricks or nothin. It's up to him to realize that...only him Some people like my old bitch never realized that and it haunts u cuz u think what could u have done differently to help or impact. At da end u did more than try...u tried to inspire and that's more than enough Message Q W E R T Y U O P A S DFG H J K L 123 return space
